title: Infinity Tone Metal Pack 2
description: Collection of 6 instrumental tracks: full compositions, looped versions and looped chunks for each song. All in the style of alternative metal/hard rock. Great for dynamic, action oriented projects - shooters, beat'em ups, etc.
longDescription:
Version 2.0: all of the tracks available in two versions now - the old one, from The Spiral EP, and a new one - rearranged, remixed and remastered, from the Event Horizon album.

Preview: SoundCloud or YouTube

Collection of 6 instrumental tracks by Karol Kosacki: full compositions, looped versions and looped chunks for each song. All in the style of alternative metal/hard rock.

Great for dynamic, action oriented projects - shooters, beat'em ups, etc.

List of included tracks for [version 1.0/version 2.0]
1. Regrow: full composition - 3:15, looped version and [9/10] looped chunks
2. Spiral: full composition - 3:28, looped version [11/12] looped chunks
3. Phoenix: full composition - 4:09, looped version and [9/12] looped chunks
4. Edge: full composition - 3:06, looped version and [8/10] looped chunks
5. Seconds: full composition - 3:10, looped version and [12/11] looped chunks
6. Submerge: full composition - 2:50, looped version and [10/11] looped chunks
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 149
Number of Audio Cues: 149
